column5: congrats to both of you what a day of bass fishing
Awesome!  Will have a try this weekend.
to all the positive feed back!   is a passion that we abviously ALL share here!
Where do you live? I'm moving.

200 acres bassasin'   a small UNTOUCHED small mouth paradice.  found this lake when i was talking with a gang of frammers on the noon brake at work. (constuction)  the man told me he lived on a lake....  i jumped on the occasion to ask him if i could fish this lake.  he told me he had a boat on his land i that i could fish there ANYTIME i wish...  next day i was there..... since then i went there 15 times...  its getting better and better and better!  iv seen  a bass ....... it had to be a seriouse 6 +....  so there in there just a matter of time and patience... that i have!!
Hey si ta des lake en tete PM moe ! we will trade hot spots !?!??!?!?
An impressible smallie report indeed   Great job
Outstanding guys!  Your reports never fail to amaze
Nice.  That is a great day.  Almost your own private lake. I need one of those.
24/7 and I are suppose to go back this weekend ....unfortunately I won't be able to make   Anyone willing to take my spot is more than welcome
That's a great story, right out of a Field and Stream or Outdoor Life article. Congrat's on the fantastic outing!
WOW, fantastic post good on you to take the time to post and let us also enjoy it with you.  Thanks,  FLEX
la belle province du quebec!   Hey whitespinnerbait.  i think this guy is willing!     now that you mention it...... it does sound like it!
I know what ya mean Bushy....it hurts to see that rport....but its a good pain....lol.   CONGRATS BOYS...that is one of the best bass reports i've seen on here!
nicely done man!
i kinda figured it was a smaller lake, i recognize some of the backrounds in these pics from older posts as well.
WOW! Time to learn French and move to Quebec! Thanks for sharing.
No need to learn French or Move here.....  Just drive down this weekend and we'll take you out for a tour of all the Lake X's....
wait a minute.............................. good thing you dont have access to that small mouth lake.     it would have a crowd of a 100 people on it by now!
I see Paul's full of hot air again!!    Hey Kev....awesome report...congrats!!
Awesome stuff, that a serious haul of smallies!
Keep reporting like this and I'm gonna have to embrace my inner Quebecois and switch countries.

moosebunk id love to be part of one of your great outtings.  we can share the same boat anytime.  you big pike lakes are calling my name....  and... whats that... i hear.... BIG smallies calling yours!  we share the same passion .............fishing!
DOOOD....that's AMAZING!!!  Thanks for sharing

Great report, awesome fish!  Word of advice....keep those lakes to yourself. I have a few of those and learned the hard way to not let anyone else in on them. All it takes to change a lake like that forever is one boat with 3 guys that like to keep big fish.

Well With all of Spinnerbaitkings's report He got me thinking .........SLOW DOWN YOU FOOL.  I took his advice and started to Find the Big ones!!!  Took my Work buddy with me for the ride!  As we get on the lake, i tell him how we always get a fish on the first cast....  He took the first cast...... FISH ON! unbelievable.    Its a Pike and the only one of the day.  Then i head out on the hunt.  Flip a YUM Brown Crayfish  on a rocky drop of and land my first of the day!    SWEET BRONZY!    A LA justin hoffman style!  This is Sly first small mouth outting of the year...  Its never to late to learn new stuff so i teach him the techniques..... He picked up FAST!    BOOM. his first! CONGRATS!  The bite is slow.... is this because im working my bait to fast.... YES!!!!  i slow it down a bit... SMACK he takes it.    Sly takes a cast right beside my honey hole... SMACK!  He lands one.    Well now we have it made !!  We leave this spot and hit one of my favourite part of the lake. ...  i call this point '' nickel point''  Let the YUM fall on the drop and i set the hook.    This one was feeding heavy!  Cristal clear lake........    Switching spots to the '' nickel'' point was the best idea i had.  Bass were STACKED one on top of the other.    FRENZY!!!    4 bass BACK 2 BACK!  had to take another shot of this one.... BEAUTY!    Then i switch it up a little bit.  i decide to go for pike ...  so i cast a 1 Oz chartreuse spinner bait from Northam...... let the bait copter in 15 FOW  Then i started to reel it in ... SLOW... i Feel a THUMP!  set the hook..... dead weight..... pike ?!!?!  Nope a 4.11Lbs Small Mouth Bass!!     Northam # 1    Then it was SLy's turn....  He flip's the crayfish on a drop that goes from 15 - 30 FOW.  Sets the hook hard and the fight is on...  He lands this beauty of a FOOTBALL!      This fish regurgitated a small pike !    release the beast!  Great day to be out .   The forecast was suposed to be rainy and 15 km/h winds....  but ended up beeing drizzle with NO wind!    to mother nature .  I LOVE YOU!
WOW!
wow great respectable report Mr. Loved the picture and big bass man!!!  Thanks for report, MTBF
Holy crap! I think we need a rules... all members must be accompanied by a site mod on fishing trips where epic fish are hiding
un-freakin-believable.
This is one of those years my boat was put away waaay too early.  Most years by now we're knee deep in snow  Nice catch,  Bushart
Very, very impressive Kevin. WTG!
thats a great day on the water kev and sly. some really nice lookin fish there, how big is the lake your on? is like 200Acres or 2000?
Nice Report & some beautiful fishies, glad to help with the thinking part the smallies are on the feed just a matter of finding them & sloooowwwwing down a bit more Richard
Awesome report! Beautiful Smallies!
Now THAT'S what you call a day of bass fishing !!  Well done boys !!
Now that is a great day of fishing. Well done.
Very humbling..  But d'ont you ever jonze for some arc-en-ciel dude??!!  pas pire pan toute.  cheers HD
great report kevin congrats
sweet report as always bro

I was going to call spam then realized that you weren't selling a guiding service, you just fish like a guide. Absolutely awesome! I don't know where this lake is but it is a Lulu. Congrats on this outing. Between this trip and the trip with your Bro you should get some sort of fishing philanthropy award. Jim
I hate you right now and it has nothing to do with simple jealousy.  Seriously...nice fish dude.
Great looking fish Kevin... congrats!
wtg bro!  great pics btw
Good God Man!!! Serious, serious report.         Damn!
I'm out of words on this one Kev   :worthy:    :clapping:    :thumbsup_anim:  You've beaten the odds and got rewarded big time Awesome job you guys Jacques
Wow, just killin' the bigs! Bien Fait!!
Holy mackinaw!  Well done!
Awesome,Awesome,Awesome.  Clarence

Great report buddy ! Im coming up there next season for sure. Awesome job on the late season smallies. This time of year its either feast or famine.......obviously its FEAST!!!!! I guess you just answered the questions about the fall feedbag.
